channel.title: blogging on Transparency, Inspection, and Adaptation
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Transparency, Inspection, and Adaptation

item.title: Everything Old is New Again
item.description: I spent some time over the weekend dragging along old posts from my tumblr blog that deal with programming. I didn’t bother with the instagram pictures or the four square checkins. After a few failed attempts to get the tumblr posts where the were suposed to be, I opted to stash them in a working directory and move them by hand. Now all of my <scarcasm>glorious code related posts</sarcasm> are in one place, it’s time to dust up some posts about my shiny new play things Twitter Bootstrap Octopress and Markdown.
